shadow.name: EXTREMES
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Modesty, expressing through extremes

gift.name: MAGNETISM
gift.description: The gift frequency of Modesty, expressing through magnetism

siddhi.name: FLORESCENCE
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Modesty, expressing through florescence

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 15 shadow frequency. The extremes you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural magnetism. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from extremes to magnetism.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your g center. Notice the sensation of extremes.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 15 consciously for 7 days, the extremes pattern will shift toward magnetism.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 15 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from extremes toward magnetism
